author: Allan Smith
title: Rand Paul says amid criticism that more Americans should be able to get tested for coronavirus
description: Sen. Rand Paul said more Americans should be able to get tested for the novel coronavirus even if they are asymptomatic after he faced criticism for how he handled his testing for COVID-19.
content: Sen. Rand Paul insisted Monday that more Americans should be able to get tested for the novel coronavirus even if they are asymptomatic after he faced criticism for being tested for COVID-19 despite not having symptoms and for continuing on with his daily lif… [+4303 chars]
